description.value:
An ounce of dark residue left behind by a shadow.

Two ounces of shadow essence can be extracted from a dead shadow with a [[/check arcana 12]] using alchemist's tools. On a failure, one ounce is extracted.

A shadow essence can be used with @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.PSBsNmH0WWBmwTMY]{calligraphy tools} as an ink to write low-level magic scrolls.

1 Ounce: Cantrip

2 Ounces: 1st Level Spell
